snippet: The top three of the 100 most highly cited scientific papers are biochemical techniques for quantifying the amount of protein in a solution.
abstract: Science Citation Index, organized effort to track citations in scientific literature begun by American scientist Eugene Garfield, shows that the most cited research papers are not the most famous ones; citations topping list are for those papers describing methods or software that has become essential in a given field of research.
lead_paragraph: The top three of the 100 most highly cited scientific papers are biochemical techniques for quantifying the amount of protein in a solution.

headline.main: Papers That Are Most Cited Aren’t Most Famous
headline.print_headline: Lists: Papers That Are Most Cited Aren’t Most Famous
